==Origin==
With an increasing number in the student body, [[Scott Summers (Earth-616)|Cyclops]] & [[Emma Frost (Earth-616)|Emma Frost]] reorganized the [[Xavier's School for Gifted Youngsters|Xavier Institute]]'s educational and training program.{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #1}} The Advocates Squad was advised by [[Rogue (Anna Marie) (Earth-616)|Rogue]].{{r|Uncanny X-Men #444}}{{r|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}

==Members==
* [[Robin Wise (Earth-616)|Boggart]] - Robin Wise was green skinned and superhumanly strong. Depowered, and current whereabouts/status unknown.
* [[Aurelie Sabayon (Earth-616)|Naiad]] - Aurelie Sabayon could breath underwater. Depowered,{{r|Decimation: House of M - The Day After #1}} and current whereabouts/status unknown. 
* [[Gerard Cooper (Earth-616)|Pinpoint]] - Gerard Cooper possessed telescopic vision. Depowered, and current whereabouts/status unknown.
* [[Pedro de Noli (Earth-616)|Trovão]] - Pedro de Noli could create sonic booms. Depowered, and current whereabouts/status unknown.
* [[Patrick Nesbitt (Earth-616)|Umbra]] -  Patrick Nesbitt controlled darkness. Depowered, and current whereabouts/status unknown.
* [[Shaun Kennedy (Earth-616)|Xenon]] - Shaun Kennedy generated light. Depowered, and current whereabouts/status unknown.

==M-Day==
After [[Decimation|M-Day]] only 27 of 182 enrolled Xavier's students retained their powers. The Advocates were disbanded along with all the other [[X-Men Training Squads]].{{r|New X-Men Vol 2 #20|#23}}

| Notes                   = 
* Since their appearance in {{cl|Uncanny X-Men #444}}, none of the members have been shown. [[Aurelie Sabayon (Earth-616)|Naiad]] was specifically mentioned as losing her powers in {{cl|Decimation: House of M - The Day After #1}}. Because of their post M-Day absence, it can be safely assumed all were depowered.
| Trivia                  = 
* The Advocates were only briefly shown once, observing the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] training in the [[Danger Room]].
* Rogue's Squad first appeared in {{cl|Uncanny X-Men #444}}, but was named in the {{cl|Official Handbook of the Marvel Universe A to Z Vol 1 13}}.
* [[Aurelie Sabayon (Earth-616)|Naiad]] was the only female student member of Advocates Squad.
* The squad was possibly named after the [[Advocates (Earth-616)|Advocates]], a team of [[Warpies]] encountered by [[Excalibur (Earth-616)|Excalibur]].
